text:
Unemployment Insurance Commission
llB Richmond Street, West
Toronto 1, Ontario
Gentlemen:
Mies Ruth Nusbaum was employed as secretary to Sr. H. Marshall McLuhan
who -was Project Director for a project whose funds were supplied by a
grant from the U. S. Office of Education. The funds were handled by
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters.
Miss Nusbaum worked from September l4, 1959, through June 30, i960
the date the project was finished. However, she was paid through
August 31 of i960 to complete the year. Mss Nusbaum did not pay
unemployment insurance during the time she was employed.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Rose Schmidt
Assistant to the President
RS:jl
CC: Miss Ruth Nusbaum
